languages.text: "Ты — моя соратница. Я не могу относиться к тебе безразлично!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты член моей команды, полноправная часть моей свиты. Я не могу относиться к вам безразлично!"

languages.text: "You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"
languages.original_text: "Ты — моя соратница. Я не могу относиться к тебе безразлично!"

traits.locale_text: "You are my comrade. I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"
"You are my comrade. I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"
"You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"
"You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"
"You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"
"You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"

languages.text: «Es mi camarada; ¡no puedo ignorarla a usted y a sus deseos!».
languages.original_text: "You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"

traits.locale_text: «Es mi camarada; ¡no puedo ignorarla a usted y a sus deseos!».

languages.text: 「お前は我が同士だ。お前の意思を、簡単に否定することはできない！」
languages.original_text: "You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は我が同士だ。お前の意思を、簡単に否定することはできない！」

languages.text: “因为你是我的伙伴。我不能对你的愿望不闻不问，随随便便把你打发走！”
languages.original_text: "You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"

traits.locale_text: “因为你是我的伙伴。我不能对你的愿望不闻不问，随随便便把你打发走！”

languages.text: "Wir sind Kameraden – ich kann Euch und Eure Wünsche nicht einfach zurückweisen!"
languages.original_text: "You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind Kameraden – ich kann Euch und Eure Wünsche nicht einfach zurückweisen!"

languages.text: « Vous êtes ma camarade, je ne peux pas me contenter de vous ignorer, vous et vos désirs ! »
languages.original_text: "You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes ma camarade, je ne peux pas me contenter de vous ignorer, vous et vos désirs ! »

languages.text: "Sen benim yoldaşımsın. Seni de isteklerini de başımdan savamam."
languages.original_text: "You are my comrade — I cannot simply dismiss you and your wishes!"
